flawed_nl_solution:
The first 6 bunches had 6 x 9 x 14 = <<6*9*14=756>>756 bananas.
There were 10 - 6 = <<10-6=9>>9 remaining bunches.
The 9 remaining bunches had 9 x 12 x 9 = <<9*12*9=972>>972 bananas.
All together, there were 756 + 972 = <<756+972=1728>>1728 bananas
Each monkey would get 1728/12 = <<1728/12=144>>144 bananas.

error_details.explanation: The result of this computation should be 4, not 9. This appears to be a minor miscalculation.
